Oh yeah, gonna plot some plots.

```{r libs, results='hide', warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)
library(gpx)
```

```{r read_data}
df1 <- read_gpx("../data/little_si.gpx")
```

```{r}
df2 <- df1$tracks$`Little Si`
```

```{r}
df2 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Time, y = Elevation)) +
  geom_line()
```
